sense.name: Make some product that is counterfeit or altered in order to falsify.
sense.examples: Joan faked data that supported her conclusions. He faked the signature on the check. The forger admitted to taking and selling other paintings. Their accountants faked the figures.

sense.name: Perform an action with an intent to deceive.
sense.commentary: Note: Compare to Sense 1; Sense 2 does not produce a [concrete] product of any kind.
sense.examples: The politician was not well prepared for the debate and faked it. How can I tell if my wife is faking it? I tend to fake an understanding of the material until I can read the text myself.
